name: TouchCog Attention, Visual Spatial Memory, Working Memory Battery
description: Touchscreen Cognition Battery for assessing Attention, Visual Spatial Memory, and Working Memory.
author: Daniel Palmer, PhD

tasks.name: Demographic Survey
tasks.description: A survey to collect demographic information from participants.

tasks.name: Continuous Performance Task
tasks.description: A task measuring sustained attention and response inhibition.

tasks.name: Paired Associates Learning
tasks.description: A task assessing visual spatial memory through paired associations.

tasks.name: Trial-Unique Non-Matching to Location
tasks.description: A task evaluating spatial working memory by requiring non-matching to location responses.
